section.section: This subtitle governs hearings, orders, and appeals in matters arising under this title.
Sections 2-210 through 2-215 of this article do not apply to rating and rating organizations.
Each order, decision, ruling, or finding of the Commissioner under this title is subject to judicial review under this subtitle.

text.section:
Notwithstanding subsection (a) of this section, an order, decision, ruling, or finding of the Commissioner under § 11-344 of this title:
is not subject to judicial review under this subtitle; and
is subject to judicial review in accordance with § 2-215 of this article.
